error.message: Call to deprecated function entity_get_display(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use EntityDisplayRepositoryInterface::getViewDisplay() instead.

Class Drupal\ert\Routing\RouteEnhancer implements deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Routing\Enhancer\RouteEnhancerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, you should use \Drupal\Core\Routing\EnhancerInterface. See https://www.drupal.org/node/2894934 Part of the deprecation means that applies() is now called on runtime instead of compile time.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to ert.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
